=== Steps to Add or Modify !WebPart (Simple or Visual both)  ===

  # Goto !SampleProject.UI -> Select !WebParts or Visual !WebParts folder as per your choice. !WebParts folder is for simple webpart and !VisualWebParts is for Visual !WebParts
  # Right click on folder -> Add -> New Item for Visual !WebPart and Class for Simple !WebPart<br>http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/S29.png
  # Refer *!SampleWebPart.cs* or *!SampleVisualWebPart* for modifying existing code used for WebParts sample in [http://code.google.com/p/visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template/downloads/detail?name=Sample%20Project%20C%23%201.0.zip Sample project]<br>http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/S37.png
